testcase.name: Verify User able to Create new job description
testcase.system-out: * def data = read('classpath:com/noorteck/qa/data/JobAPI_TestData.json') .. passed * def filename = env == 'scrum' ? 'classpath:com/noorteck/qa/helper/Headers.feature@valid-auth' : 'classpath:com/noorteck/qa/helper/Headers.feature@no-auth' . passed * def info = call read(filename) .......................................... passed * def URL = baseUrl ....................................................... passed * configure headers = info.HEADER ......................................... passed * def PATH = addAPI ....................................................... passed * def REQUESTBODY = read(data.requestBody) ................................ passed * set REQUESTBODY.experience[0] = data.scrum[0].experience ................ passed * set REQUESTBODY.jobDescription = data.scrum[0].jobDescription ........... passed * set REQUESTBODY.jobId = data.scrum[0].jobId ............................. passed * set REQUESTBODY.jobTitle = data.scrum[0].jobTitle ....................... passed * set REQUESTBODY.project[0].projectName = data.scrum[0].projectName ...... passed Given url URL ............................................................. passed And path PATH ............................................................. passed And request REQUESTBODY ................................................... passed When method POST .......................................................... passed * print response .......................................................... passed Then status 201 ........................................................... passed And match response.jobId == data.scrum[0].jobId ........................... passed And match response.jobTitle == data.scrum[0].jobTitle ..................... passed And match response.jobDescription == data.scrum[0].jobDescription ......... passed And match response.project[0].projectName ==data.scrum[0].projectName ..... passed And match response.experience[0] == data.scrum[0].experience .............. passed
